reasoning: Kawasaki disease (mucocutaneous lymph node syndrome) primarily affects children <5 years. Incidence varies by geography: ~8-10 per 100k in Japan, ~5 per 100k in Asian populations, ~2-3 per 100k in North America/Europe. Global estimate ~2 per 100k population based on epidemiological studies.
source: WHO epidemiological studies, Kawasaki disease registries
